content:
# I have successfully extracted 5 Iron Plates from the Stone Furnace.
# My inventory now contains:
# - 1 Stone Furnace
# - 5 Iron Ore
# - 5 Iron Plates
# - 1 Iron Gear Wheel

# The Stone Furnace is currently showing a status of "NO_INGREDIENTS," which means it has no Iron Ore left to smelt.
# I can now proceed to craft the Assembling Machine, which requires:
# - 1 Iron Gear Wheel
# - 1 Iron Plate
# - 1 Electronic Circuit (which I need to craft as well)

# I already have the Iron Gear Wheel and Iron Plates needed for the Assembling Machine.
# Next, I need to craft the Electronic Circuit. 

# To craft the Electronic Circuit, I need:
# - 1 Copper Cable (which requires Copper Plates)
# - 1 Iron Plate

# First, I will need to smelt some Copper Ore into Copper Plates. 
# Let's check if I have Copper Ore in my inventory.
copper_ore_quantity = inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.CopperOre, 0)

if copper_ore_quantity == 0:
    # If I don't have Copper Ore, I need to find and harvest some.
    copper_position = nearest(Resource.CopperOre)
    move_to(copper_position)  # Move to the nearest Copper Ore patch.
else:
    # If I have Copper Ore, I can proceed to smelt it.
    print(f"I have {copper_ore_quantity} Copper Ore in my inventory.")
